content: It has come to my notice that 70 percent or less of the newbies in this forum has little or less information of Bitcoin before adventuring into the forum and there by asking unnecessary questions about btc. So I sudjest studying outside the forum before posting or commenting otherwise you will get bored and tired because you will be lost. Learn things like:-what is Bitcoin-funtions of Bitcoin-inportance of Bitcoin -the Creation of Bitcoin-bitcoin wallets and how it's transferred.-what is coin-how is Bitcoin tradedEtc.Most person who joined this forum left immediately after noticing that they can't comprehend on the modules operandi of the forum. It's just like being invited to a church and gave u mic to preach when you have no topic to tender to the audience. You start tapping the mic and blowing breeze to the mic because you are not inform. Please do proper investigation on crypto/btc sothat it will multivate and makes you add value to yourself and the entire forum.What do you guys think?

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Look — I totally agree with most of what you have said, but this type of thread has been posted probably a hundredth time already. Before posting a thread, probably do a quick look if similar posts have been made already; or at least make sure you have something new to put to the table(a new take/opinion, perhaps) before posting a similar topic.

We are here to learn and if topic is raise people look into it and see what dey can learn. not the other way round.no body is an iland of knowledge and learning never end. Thanks though! for the informative link sheard. It will also go along way to our line of discussion.You will always get this reaction from the community when you create common topics that have been discussed severally. If you are not new in the crypto industry then you have to write on novel topics that have not been over-discussed in this forum. At this stage, it will be better to keep learning before considering starting a thread. Another key characteristic that will help you learn more is to accept corrections without offense. Many newbies left the forum because they were not teachable.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Whoever wants to learn must choose learning sources carefully. I respect the efforts made by many to simplify the information, but sometimes you have to research the details of the science to be able to understand.Bitcoin is a combination of many sciences in economics, cryptography, and decentralization, and these things need to be learned first before you realize. The importance of Bitcoin is, therefore, it is not a quick investment that will make you rich or a way to profit from a home or generate income in the thousands of dollars easily, as is found in some YouTube and Telegram channels.You can start here https://www.lopp.net/bitcoin-information.html It will help you a lot to get started right.

comments.author: Bureau
comments.body: I feel it is better to first understand the present financial system and then venture into Bitcoin's ecosystem. There thing like centralization, inflation and governance that needs to be understood. Then if you try to understand about Bitcoin it will be easier than directly venturing into Bitcoin. The reason why Bitcoin was created was to challenge the existing financial system. I mean without knowing the problems how will understand the solution. For me the best resource was to read the whitepaper of Bitcoin. It has everything you need to fully understand it's capability.

comments.author: Sim_card
comments.body: OP, I can see that you are getting this wrongly. This forum is to build newbies on all angle of bitcoin knowledge,it is open for newbies to come and learn, and be grounded on bitcoin. It isn't a bad idea to learn what is bitcoin here or get your first knowledge of bitcoin here. It is how you take learning serious that will make you grow and improve yourself. Someone that already has an idea on bitcoin can come here and might not improve better than who learnt majority of what he knows on bitcoin here. This forum is the best place to learn bitcoin because it has more than enough of what you want to know. Use the search engine before creating new topics,so many topics created by newbies have been discussed times without numbers.
